article:
Do you know anything about Chinese medicine?It has 5,000 years of history. It's a part of our great _ . Many people in the world think it's the greatest medicine. They go to _ traditional Chinese doctors when they're feeling bad. And Chinese medicine really works _ .
You know that Western medicine is good _ many illnesses. But now most people like the _ Chinese medicine and it gets more and more _ . Western medicine is often made from chemical materials , _ it's often bad for people's health. Traditional Chinese Medicine(TCM)is made from all kinds of _ ,and it always brings great treatment  _ . So more and more people in the world like TCM,and TCM is _ an important medical way in the world. It's our honor to share this great medicine with you and other friends all over the world!
